reviews.text: Seldom do I ever get a staff member that doesn't understand my requests on equipment. When I ask to speak to someone else or they are confused about I always get transferred to another specialist.  This is key to me saving time.  Wonderful group.
reviews.title: Seldom do I ever get a staff member‚Ä¶

reviews.text: Usually, I receive a quote link for the non-government site from end user requests. However, the B&H system always prompts me before checkout to transfer my order to the government site and it is a seamless transition for me. I do not have to create a new shopping cart or enter my shipping info and payment info a second time.
reviews.title: Government Checkout

reviews.text:
I can find what I need very easily. This is vastly different from the Apple Store, even with a business account, where I'm never sure if I'm ordering through the business account. The Apple Store also makes me log in all over again if I'm trying to look at my account info.

The variety of products available at B&H is impressive and the shipping rates are very reasonable.
reviews.title: I can find what I need very easily

reviews.text: I love how easy it is for me to buy equipment for my Multimedia program compared to how I used to have to do it when I first started teaching, where I had to email a Oklahoma rep and wait for them to respond with a quote and then wait for them to send shipping information after turning in the PO. Using the B&H photo business website is much more convenient because I can select what I need put it in the cart and upload a photo of my PO. It's awesome.
reviews.title: I love how easy it is for me to buy‚Ä¶

reviews.text: Easy and fast navigation.  Good priduct descriotions, really helped to find what suits my needs best. Price same as (at least not more than) other sellers, incl Amazon.  Free expedited shipping, also as good as Amazon. Ultimate proof yet to come when item arrives and gets put to use.
reviews.title: Easy and fast navigation

reviews.text: 5 Stars + One of the best companies I've ever purchased through. Great gear selection, incredible pricing, fast free shipping.  Can't recommend highly enough.  True pros over here.
reviews.title: 5 Stars + One of the best companies‚Ä¶

reviews.text: B&H Photo has a great website and provides outstanding service at competitive prices.  I have been buying from B&H for many years and it has never failed me.  The packaging is also superb and the deliveries are fast.
reviews.title: B&H Photo is a great company

reviews.text: Most reliable, helpful, and genuine store for all things photo and computer. As a third generation native New Yorker, I highly recommend B&H. I have been shopping there since they were on 17th street.
reviews.title: Where Native Yorker's Shop

reviews.text: The price on my R6 mk2 dropped $300 a week after I bought it. B&H promptly and cheerfully refunded the difference. Old White House News photographer here, been doing business with them since my F3. Thank you B&H
reviews.title: Thank you B&H for cheerfully refunding the difference

reviews.text: Just a straightforward way to find, evaluate, and purchase products for photography.  And then the same in return for returns when occasionally necessary.  Great job as usual B&H!
reviews.title: Just a straightforward way to find

reviews.text: B&H has almost everything I need in stock. Their pricing is great, and their customer service is impeccable. I have been buying from them since they were in a second floor store in the 1970s and I‚Äôve never been disappointed.
reviews.title: B&H has everything I need!

reviews.text: B&H Photo always has a great selection of products in stock at reasonable prices. I really like the expedited shipping as I usually receive my purchased items within 2 days of ordering.
reviews.title: Would highly recommend B&H Photo

reviews.text: I have purchased items from B@H photo in the past and have always received prompt delivery with the items being shipped carefully and expeditiously.  If I have issues with product or questions they have the immediate expertise to address them.
reviews.title: Reliability and honest pricing

reviews.text: My chat with Rob K. was very helpful in not only confirming my choice of flash, that it *will* work with my camera, but also suggesting, per my request, the correct PC cord for the unit.
reviews.title: My chat with Rob K

reviews.text: The site and checkout are clean and easy, shipping is quick and well packaged. Bought a couple of times here and never had to contact customer service yet. Very satisfied.

reviews.text: All the other companies seem to have unqualified people in outward facing positions. Every time I've dealt with B&H things have been correct, on time and hassle free.

Incredibly easy to search B&H for what you want to purchase, place items in my Cart, then easily pay with credit card.

reviews.text: I cannot believe I was able to get a custom Mac Mini which would have taken two weeks from Apple for $200 less than Apple. It was so easy to order and will come with free shipping in 2 days.

reviews.text: the worker although ge took longer than expected never gave up or showed any discontent about my own behaviour even apolagized when making a small mistake. he handled it with care and dedication.and i thank the worker for his help on reciving my purchase information. when the email i was supose to recive was never sent/recived.

reviews.text: This was a great experience overall. Jill was very helpful in answering questions and getting me a samples that arrived surprisingly fast. The products are high quality and the branding looks clean and sharp. They have a great selection of options too. Highly recommend Flashbay.
reviews.title: This was a great experience overall

reviews.text: Jill was very helpful in assisting me with our flash drive order. We went back and forth many times to decide on a size and qty of flash drives. Once we placed the order our shipment came in a very timely manner and was of great quality. We will be returning for more buisness.
reviews.title: VERY HELPFUL

reviews.text:

Flashbay was very professional, timely and informative. 
I recommend this company.

reviews.text: I was handed a project after a coworker left and was given little instruction as to what was going on. When I tell you that Donovan Rains was beyond helpful, throughout the entire process, that is still an understatement. Not only was he attentive, quick to reply, quick to act and incredibly knowledgeable but did so while being both personable and professional. Then on top of it all our products came out beautifully and we cannot wait to give them out at our upcoming company party. 5 star product and 5 star customer service. We will be using them for our needs in the future!
reviews.title: Great product and great employee!

reply.message:
Hello Sheena,

At Flashbay, we appreciate our customers, no matter how large or small the order is.
We truly appreciate your support and can‚Äôt wait for the opportunity to serve you again.
-Flashbay Management

The team was incredibly helpful with our product ordering. Not only were they great with providing guidance while selecting the product and placing the order, but their response time was next level. reviews.text:
Hi Jill,
 
We recently had the pleasure of experiencing Jill's outstanding service, and we couldn't be more impressed! From the moment we placed our order for water bottles, Jill's swiftness in getting them to us was truly remarkable. Jill's efficiency stood out right from the start. Our order was processed promptly, and within no time, she ensured that our water bottles were on their way to us. This level of responsiveness is a rarity and certainly made our experience with her stand out. Not only was Jill quick in delivering the goods, but the quality of the water bottles exceeded our expectations. The bottles were sturdy and well-printed.
 
Thanks,
reviews.title: Great quality
